languages.text: "Кажется, ледышка не слишком рвется об этом говорить. И, наверное, я тоже не хочу об этом лишний раз думать".
"Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."
languages.original_text: "Кажется, ледышка не слишком рвется об этом говорить. И, наверное, я тоже не хочу об этом лишний раз думать".

traits.locale_text: "Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."
"Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."
"Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."
"Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."

languages.text: “冰人儿似乎不太愿意谈论这件事情，而我也一秒钟也不愿意多想，除非真的有必要。”
languages.original_text: "Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."

traits.locale_text: “冰人儿似乎不太愿意谈论这件事情，而我也一秒钟也不愿意多想，除非真的有必要。”

languages.text: « Le rabat-joie n'a pas l'air disposé à en parler, et pour ma part, je ne suis pas disposée à y penser une seconde de plus que nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: "Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."

traits.locale_text: « Le rabat-joie n'a pas l'air disposé à en parler, et pour ma part, je ne suis pas disposée à y penser une seconde de plus que nécessaire. »

languages.text: «Si al hombre de hielo no le apetece hablar de ello, creo que prefiero no pensar en el asunto un segundo más de lo necesario».
languages.original_text: "Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."

traits.locale_text: «Si al hombre de hielo no le apetece hablar de ello, creo que prefiero no pensar en el asunto un segundo más de lo necesario».

languages.text: 「氷の君はその件を話すのに全然乗り気じゃなさそうね。必要以上にこの話題に触れるのはやめておいたらどうかしら」
languages.original_text: "Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."

traits.locale_text: 「氷の君はその件を話すのに全然乗り気じゃなさそうね。必要以上にこの話題に触れるのはやめておいたらどうかしら」

languages.text: "Der Eismann scheint nicht begierig, darüber zu sprechen. Und ich will wohl auch keine Sekunde länger daran denken, als ich unbedingt muss."
languages.original_text: "Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."

traits.locale_text: "Der Eismann scheint nicht begierig, darüber zu sprechen. Und ich will wohl auch keine Sekunde länger daran denken, als ich unbedingt muss."

languages.original_text: "Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."

languages.text: "Buz küpümüzün konuşası yokmuş, benim de bu konuyu bir saniye dahi olsa gereğinden fazla düşünmeye isteğim yok."
languages.original_text: "Iceman doesn't seem too eager to talk about it, and I suppose I don't want to think about it a second longer than I have to either."

traits.locale_text: "Buz küpümüzün konuşası yokmuş, benim de bu konuyu bir saniye dahi olsa gereğinden fazla düşünmeye isteğim yok."
